title: ‘Survivor,’ Season 41, Episode 4
description:
Tyson Apostol is joined by The Ringer’s Juliet Litman and Riley McAtee to break down everything from Episode 4. They discuss the reward and immunity challenges and give their takes on whether purposefully losing one is ever a good strategy. Plus, Tyson ups the ante on his beard challenge with Riley.
Host: Tyson Apostol
Guest: Juliet Litman and Riley McAtee
Editor: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
